trans-unit.source: The abstract base class from which the workflow data member support class <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable`1" /> derives.
trans-unit.target: Clase base abstracta de la que se deriva la clase compatible de miembros de datos de flujo de trabajo <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable`1" />.

trans-unit.source: The name for the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />.
trans-unit.target: Nombre para el objeto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />.

trans-unit.source: The type for the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />.
trans-unit.target: Tipo del objeto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />.

trans-unit.source: The configuration options for the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />.
trans-unit.target: Opciones de configuración para el objeto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes and returns new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa y devuelve una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />.

trans-unit.source: The new variable.
trans-unit.target: Nueva variable.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityWithResult" /> that represents the default value for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece la clase <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityWithResult" /> que representa el valor predeterminado de esta <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />.
trans-unit.target: Valor predeterminado de <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />.

trans-unit.source: The current execution context.
trans-unit.target: Contexto de ejecución actual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" /> using the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityContext" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el valor de la clase <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />utilizando la clase <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityContext" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />.
trans-unit.target: Valor de <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />.

trans-unit.source: The activity context of the executing activity.
trans-unit.target: Contexto de actividad de la actividad que se está ejecutando.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Location" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el objeto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Location" /> para este objeto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />.

trans-unit.source: The location for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />.
trans-unit.target: Ubicación de <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Activities.VariableModifiers" /> value for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el valor de <see cref="T:System.Activities.VariableModifiers" /> para esta <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />.

trans-unit.source: The variable modifier value for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />.
trans-unit.target: Valor de modificador variable para esta <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad es de solo lectura en runtime.

trans-unit.source: If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Si el valor se establece en runtime, se produce una excepción <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el nombre de <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />.
trans-unit.target: Nombre del objeto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad es de solo lectura en runtime.

trans-unit.source: If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Si el valor se establece en runtime, se produce una excepción <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el nombre de <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />.
trans-unit.target: Nombre del objeto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />.

trans-unit.source: The current execution context.
trans-unit.target: Contexto de ejecución actual.

trans-unit.source: The new value.
trans-unit.target: Nuevo valor.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" /> using the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityContext" />.
trans-unit.target: Establece el valor de la clase <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" /> utilizando la clase <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityContext" /> especificada.
